projects.name: Restaurant Reviews
projects.description: An application created during the Grow with Google / Udacity Mobile Web Specialist Nanodegree course. This site allows users to favorite, store, & add reviews for a list of restaurants.
projects.tech: HTML, CSS, JS, Service Workers, IndexedDB / idb

projects.name: Stamp Inventory
projects.altText: Photo of Stamp Inventory Tracking Website
projects.description: A simple site created to show the current inventory for self-inking stamp supplies, with a form to update when supplies are used or received.
projects.tech: HTML, CSS, JS, Google Sheets API

projects.name: Daily CSS Images
projects.altText: Photos of a tiger and elephant drawn with CSS
projects.description: Images created using CSS, following prompts from a daily email. Intended to help improve my CSS understanding & skills.

projects.name: Free Code Camp Projects
projects.altText: Photos of projects completed using the Free Code Camp Website
projects.description: Projects created while working through the Free Code Camp curriculum. Through these projects, I worked with new API's, learned how to import data from sites, & started learning more about styling and testing. I also improved some of the documentation for Free Code Camp's weather API source.
